pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic has the following built-in palettes, and will continue to update and expand them:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["AntV brand color (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"antv"}],")"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"spectral"}],": A gradient palette suitable for displaying continuous data scenarios"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can get the complete list of built-in palettes through the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-palettes","children":"getPalettes"}]," method."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can also get the specific color values or generation function of a palette based on its ID through the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-palette","children":"getPalette"}]," method."]}]]}]]
